message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.LG, cs.CY

Reasoning: The paper discusses linguistic relations in oral conversations and how they shape opinions and knowledge. This topic falls under the sub-category of natural language processing (NLP), which is covered in cs.CL. The paper also mentions the use of big data and opinion mining, which could fall under the sub-categories of social and information networks (cs.SI), data structures and algorithms (cs.SD), and machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper discusses the dynamics of cooperation and competition in linguistic adaptation, which could fall under the sub-category of multi-agent systems (cs.CY).
